511780.name: One Day in London - Chapter III
511780.description:
This is the third chapter of the visual novel One Day in London.

Mystical events unfold in London. There is no more way back...
New losses lead Jeremy to new achievements, as the lines of the story twine into a fascinating canvas. He will have to face his fears soon. What lies in store for him? It is up to you to decide, dear reader. Keep your eyes open: sometimes it takes but a single word to change the whole story!

Discover what happens next to Jeremy in the new episode!

  • 6 to 14 hours of gameplay!
  • New mini-games
  • New characters
  • More rituals
  • And many, many different story options!
